ValidationRule.description: If the Do Not Call checkbox is selected a Phone number must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(DoNotCall)), DoNotCall = True, Phone = "", NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"NSS")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Do Not Call checkbox is selected a Phone number must be populated.
